mapper.select: SELECT g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, g.gdsImg, g.gdsThumbImg, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsDate FROM goods g INNER JOIN goods_category c ON g.cateCode = c.cateCode WHERE g.cateCode = #{cateCode}

SELECT g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsThumbImg, gdsDate FROM goods g INNER JOIN goods_category c ON g.cateCode = c.cateCode WHERE g.gdsNum = #{gdsNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply(gdsNum, userId, repCon) VALUES (#{gdsNum}, #{userId}, #{repCon})
mapper.select: SELECT r.repNum, r.gdsNum, r.userId, r.repCon, r.repDate, a.userName FROM reply r INNER JOIN account a ON r.userId = a.userId WHERE gdsNum = #{gdsNum}
